price: Mu vy’ukuri Imana Allah, Irazi neza ibinyegejwe ibiremwa mu majuru n’isi, ni Yo mu vy’ukuri, Izi neza ibinyegejwe mu mishaha y’ibiremwa[3].
arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَٰلِمُ غَيۡبِ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ إِنَّهُۥ عَلِيمُۢ بِذَاتِ ٱلصُّدُورِ
footnotes: [3] Nko kugira amakenga mu mushaha w’umuntu mu kwemera isengwa ry’Imana Imwe Rudende Allah, canke mu kwemera Intumwa Muhamadi (nyakugira amahoro n’impuhwe z’Imana Allah), canke mu kutubahiriza amabwirizwa ku bitari ivyo.

meta.transliteration: inna al-laha ʿālimu ghaybi al-samāwāti wal-arḍi innahu ʿalīmun bidhāti al-ṣudūri
